summary: Freshly Picked allows players to earn Alchemy XP by harvesting ingredients and catching critters.  Nirnroots (and other special flora) are also affected by the Green Thumb perk now.
descriptionHtml:
[heading]Features[/heading]
Freshly Picked allows players to earn Alchemy XP by harvesting ingredients and catching critters. Nirnroots (and the items below) are also affected by the Green Thumb perk now.

The XP gained is equivalent to the gold value of the item(s) harvested before the Green Thumb perk is applied. If the item does not have a value, 1 XP is earned.
[heading]Supported Flora[/heading]
[list]
[*]Default Flora
[*]Default Trees
[*]Nirnroots
[*]Crimson Nirnroots
[*]Sleeping Tree Sap
[*]Eldergleam Sap
[*]Poison Blooms
[*]Canticle Bark
[*]Planter Flora
[*]Coin Purses*
[*]Piles of Gold*
[/list]
* XP disabled by default.
[heading]Supported Fauna**[/heading]
[list]
[*]Moths
[*]Butterflies
[*]Dragonflies
[*]Torchbugs
[*]Bees
[*]Catchable Fish
[*]Waterfall Salmon
[*]Dead waterfall salmon
[*]Wisp Cores
[/list]
** Green Thumb disabled by default.
[heading]Compatibiity[/heading]
[list]
[*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE v1.7.1[/url] or later is required.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]Sky UI[/url] is optional but necessary to change the mod's default settings.
[*]Dawnguard, Hearthfire, and Dragonborn are supported but not required.
[/list]
[heading]FAQ's[/heading]
[i]Why are coin purses and piles of gold considered flora?[/i]

Code-wise, there is no difference between a coin purse and a Fly Amanita mushroom. This is why the Green Thumb perk already applies to things like Egg Sacs and Charred Skeevers by default. I just kept it consistent with Dragonborn's piles of gold.


[i]How do I know when the Green Thumb perk is being applied?[/i]

The correct item count will always display when harvesting ingredients from flora and tree objects. For everything else, a second "item added" message will appear to indicate the perk's effect has been applied. This secondary message can be disabled in the Mod Configuration Menu if you so desire.


[i]Does this mod affect any tracked game stats?[/i]

Yes. The "Ingredients Harvested" game stat will increment by 1 every time you catch a critter or harvest special flora that is not already tracked. (Flora and tree objects are tracked by default. Nirnroots and crimson nirnroots increment the "Nirnroots Found" stat. Moths and butterflies are covered under the "Wings Plucked" stat.)
author: KainXavier
